mapper.select: select os.no,os.qty, os.state_name, state, os.member_email, os.price,os.content,os.name,os.item_no,m.name as member_name from p1_member m inner join (select os.no,os.qty,os.title as state_name, os.code as state, os.member_email, m.price,m.content,m.name,m.no as item_no from p1_market m inner join (select os.no,os.qty,os.title,os.code,c.item_no,c.member_email from p1_cart c inner join (select o.no,o.cart_no,o.qty,os.title,os.code from p1_order o inner join p1_order_state os on o.state = os.code) os on c.no = os.cart_no) os on m.no = os.item_no where m.code = #{code}) os on os.member_email = m.email order by os.no desc
select title as state_name,code as state from p1_order_state
